item.title: Warm welcome at the University of Salzburg
item.description: Today, the University of Salzburg gave me a warm welcome by announcing my start on its website’s news section (in German). Thank you!

item.title: Appointment at the University of Salzburg
item.description: I am very happy to share thatI am appointed professor at the Department of Artificial Intelligence and Human Interfaces (AIHI) at the University of Salzburg, Austria, as of today. With this appointment, I will join the project EXDIGIT (Excellence in Digital Sciences and Interdisciplinary Technologies).
